Need help with a large meeting or event?
YOUR ONE SOURCE
FOR ALL THE WAYS YOU NEED TO MEET
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
As your PGi Account Manager, I want to make sure you are aware of the event solutions that you can use to host large or formal meetings/events.
PGi's complete event management solutions include:
- Expert Event Managers that take care of all the details before, during and after your event - The most experienced Professional Announcers in the business - Range of solutions from pure audio calls, to audio/web events to webcasting to fit the type of meeting or event you need to host - Ability to connect up to 15,000 participants - Lots of reporting options to capture attendee information - Many other features like replays, transcriptions, translations Let PGi handle your next event.
When it's too complicated or too important to run your own meeting or event, that's where PGi can help. Please contact me directly to learn more.
Regards,
